statements: DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_id = 100 AND first_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM communications WHERE client_id = 200 AND communication_type = 'Email'
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE client_id = (SELECT client_id FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM contact_history WHERE client_id = 1 AND contact_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM Contacts WHERE client_id = 5 AND contact_name = 'John Doe';
